com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class TimerInternal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.TimerInternal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class TimerInternal
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Helper class for components containing timers, such as Timer and Sprite.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AlarmHandler component 
      private boolean enabled 
      private Handler handler 
      private int interval

      Timer constructor
      TimerInternal(AlarmHandler component, boolean enabled, int interval, Handler handler)
      Timer constructor allowing injection of a mock Handler for test purposes

    • Constructor Detail

      • TimerInternal

        public TimerInternal(AlarmHandler component,
                     boolean enabled,
                     int interval)
        Timer constructor
        Parameters:
        component - the component whose AlarmHandler.alarm() method should be called on timer intervals
        enabled - whether it is initially enabled
        interval - time in ms

      • TimerInternal

        public TimerInternal(AlarmHandler component,
                     boolean enabled,
                     int interval,
                     Handler handler)
        Timer constructor allowing injection of a mock Handler for test purposes
        Parameters:
        component - the component whose AlarmHandler.alarm() method should be called on timer intervals
        enabled - whether it is initially enabled
        interval - time in ms
        handler - the handler whose android.os.Handler#postDelayed(Runnable, long) method is called to request calls of this after the delay specified via Interval(int)

    • Method Detail

      • Interval

        public int Interval()
        Interval getter.
        Returns:
        timer interval in ms

      • Interval

        public void Interval(int interval)
        Interval property setter method: sets the interval between timer events.
        Parameters:
        interval - timer interval in ms

      • Enabled

        public boolean Enabled()
        Enabled property getter method.
        Returns:
        true indicates a running timer, false a stopped timer

      • Enabled

        public void Enabled(boolean enabled)
        Enabled property setter method: starts or stops the timer.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true starts the timer, false stops it

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
